```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
respondentID <- 1
```

<!-- This goes in the survey google sheet block for reading in the doe -->

```{r message=FALSE}
root <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhelvy/tmfConjoint/master/survey/pilot2/'
source(paste(root, 'survey/functions.R', sep=''))
doe <- fread(paste(root, 'doe/trips/', respondentID, '.csv', sep=''))

# source(here::here('survey', 'pilot2', 'survey', 'functions.R'))

# Filter out the alternatives
trip1 <- doe[(altID == 1) & (qID == 1)]
trip2 <- doe[(altID == 2) & (qID == 1)]
trip3 <- doe[(altID == 3) & (qID == 1)]
```
(1 of 5) If these were your only options for this trip, which would you choose?
